messages.subject: (no subject)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/29/02 5:57:59 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/29/02 5:57:59 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< We put a
spoonful in her mouth while she was open and screaming. She ate the rest of
the bowl. Too coersive? ;-) >>

I actually do that with Jalen regularly, he's not very willing to try
anything the first time (heck, he's only one y.o.) so I put a little on his
lip and after he tastes it he ends up gobbling the entire bowl down.
Sometimes Moms really can know best!! I would never try to make him eat
something he truly didn't want.
Ren
